articles.author: Aaron Raj
articles.title: Why is Google phasing out third party cookies on Chrome? - Tech Wire Asia
articles.description: For Google, disabling third party cookies on the Chrome browser is focused mainly on improving privacy on the web.
articles.content:
• Google Chrome is the worlds most popular browser.
